Package com.example.hoard

Class ItemDB

java.lang.Object
com.example.hoard.ItemDB
public class ItemDB extends Object
A database helper class for managing the 'items' collection in Firebase Firestore.

    • deleteItemByField

      public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<Void> deleteItemByField(com.google.firebase.firestore.CollectionReference collectionReference, String fieldName, Object fieldValue)
      This method searches the collection for documents where 'fieldName' equals 'fieldValue'. If matching documents are found, it proceeds to delete them. The method returns a Task that indicates the completion status of the operation.
      Parameters:
      collectionReference - The Firestore CollectionReference where the deletion is to be performed.
      fieldName - The name of the field to check for the given value.
      fieldValue - The value to match for the specified field.
      Returns:
      A Task representing the asynchronous delete operation. The task is successful when all deletions are successful, and it fails if any deletion fails.
